name: Parallel World
overview: Parallel World is notable as the first RPG published by Enix, although the later Dragon Quest crew had nothing to do with it. A true role-playing game with 26 verbs, 100 characters, 10 monster types, 20 types of food, 26 swords, 26 crystals, 21 dungeons and 100 ilnesses, where the player would travel between 7 parallel world.
